endpoints.name: service
endpoints.description: This document which gleefully describes itself via json.

endpoints.name: get
endpoints.description: Get a specific score from the Scores collection.

arguments.name: scoreId
arguments.description: scoreId is a string GUID used as primary key.

endpoints.name: insert
endpoints.description: Insert the JSON representation of a Score object into the scores collection. Data provided via document body.

endpoints.name: delete
endpoints.description: Delete the document(s) with the given scoreId from the scores collection.

arguments.name: scoreId
arguments.description: scoreId is a string GUID that identifies the score document.
